name: Cauldron Craft
description:
Welcome to Arcia, a town of overflowing magic and colorful characters!

Explore the world with Fay the witch, grow flowers, go fishing, and forage for magical ingredients, then throw everything your cauldron to create clothes and decorations!

-Dress up and decorate!
-Hundreds of clothes and decorations to craft, including rares, epics and legendaries!
-Explore the forest and countryside in search of interesting and odd ingredients. The longer you play, the more of a variety you'll find!
-Visit stores that open and close in real time! Buy new hairstyles and upgrade your house!
-Befriend unique characters and get to know them by talking to them every day! They won't have much to say if they're at work, but if you find them out and about when they're off the clock, they may start opening up to you about themselves!
-Open a fashion shop, and share your clothing designs with the townsfolk!

Please note that Cauldron Craft does not support the transferring of saved game data between devices, and if you uninstall it, your saved game data may be deleted.
